about.title: About Us
about.description: At Artdeco outdoor, we are passionate about creating beautiful and functional outdoor and indoor living spaces. With over 15 years of experience in the industry, our company is currently operating in 8 countries.

dealer.title: Become a Dealer
dealer.subtitle: Join our network of premium outdoor living solution dealers
dealer.ctaText: By becoming a dealer with ART DECO you gain the unique opportunity to be part of a successful team with numerous benefits.
dealer.advantage1Desc: Benefit from our comprehensive brand management services, including website upkeep, social media management, and materials maintenance to reinforce your brand effectively.
dealer.advantage2Desc: Manage incoming orders specific to your region, enabling you to focus on your local market while still receiving broader support.
dealer.advantage3Desc: We prioritize establishing robust and secure trade relationships with all our dealers, aiming to ensure your safety and support within our environment.
dealer.advantage4Desc: Gain a competitive edge by captivating potential clients with professional 3D presentations that empower you to convert projects into confident orders.
dealer.partnerSubtitle: Join the vanguard of Art Deco luxury. We are seeking visionaries to represent our brand in key global markets.
dealer.legalText: Your information is handled with the highest level of professional confidentiality and integrity.
dealer.successMsg: Your inquiry has been successfully received. A partnership specialist will review your profile and contact you within 48 business hours.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about partnering with ArtDeco.

q1.question: What are the requirements to become an Artdeco dealer?
q1.answer: To become an Artdeco dealer, you need to complete our official dealer application form and specify the region you intend to represent. Additionally, applicants are expected to submit a short business plan, competitor analysis, and a digital marketing strategy tailored to their market.

q2.question: What support does Artdeco offer to its dealers?
q2.answer:
We provide comprehensive support to ensure our dealers maintain a premium and competitive presence in their region. This includes:
  • Access to our website and dealer admin panel
  • Automatic forwarding of inquiries based on the dealer's region
  • Catalogs, brochures, and professionally designed promotional materials
  • High-resolution product images, lifestyle visuals, and 3D renders
  • Technical documentation, DWG files, and installation manuals
  • Online and on-site training support
  • Assistance with import–export processes and logistics

q3.question: How is the dealer's profit structured?
q3.answer: Artdeco dealers benefit from receiving regional inquiries without the need for additional marketing investments. Artdeco manages brand visibility, digital presence, website operations, social media, and printed materials. This allows our dealers to focus on sales while maintaining a strong competitive advantage in their region.

q4.question: How is technical support and after-sales service organized?
q4.answer: Our technical and foreign trade teams provide full support for unique or large-scale projects—covering engineering, installation guidance, and all required documentation. Spare parts, technical files, and instruction manuals are always available to guarantee a smooth after-sales experience.

q5.question: How can our team learn about Artdeco systems?
q5.answer: We offer both online and on-site training programs for dealers and their sales teams. Training includes product knowledge, installation procedures, sales techniques, and detailed technical documentation. It is recommended that sales representatives gain at least 60–70% familiarity with Artdeco systems to operate effectively.

newsletter.title: Keep in touch with Art Deco
newsletter.subtitle: Register for our newsletter to receive the most recent news, perspectives, and concepts from Art Deco
newsletter.thankYouMessage: Thanks for subscribing — we'll send updates to your inbox.

retractablePergolaRoof.title: Retractable Pergola Roof
retractablePergolaRoof.heroDesc1: Retractable Pergola: The Ultimate Solution for Outdoor Spaces! Our Retractable Pergola Models provide excellent solutions for your outdoor areas with a variety of color and design options!
retractablePergolaRoof.heroDesc2: Pergolas are ideal for protecting your outdoor spaces from various weather conditions. They are perfect for patios, decks, verandas, terraces, restaurants, cafes, and as standalone structures to create covered areas for your home or restaurant. Constructed from aluminum and a vinyl-like composite material.
retractablePergolaRoof.barToneDesc: The Baritone awning provides excellent shade and protection from both sun and rain. Its sides are enclosed with Vetriglass vertical automatic glass systems, allowing you to enjoy your living spaces year-round.
retractablePergolaRoof.tenorDesc: The Tenor awning is crafted to enhance the appearance of your exterior facades. Its unique design and advanced technology offer a modern touch to any space. Unlike traditional awnings, Tenor's flat structure maximizes your usable area.
retractablePergolaRoof.sopranoDesc: The Soprano is an ergonomic retractable pergola system that hangs straight without needing any posts. It is easy-to-use automatic folding function creates comfortable living spaces.
retractablePergolaRoof.altoDesc: Alto is designed to refresh your space with its aesthetic appeal, innovative concept, and unique design. It minimizes the impact of bad weather, creating durable outdoor living areas.
retractablePergolaRoof.durabilityText: Serge Ferrari membranes are engineered to be highly durable, with excellent resistance to UV radiation, weathering, and abrasion. This ensures that the membrane tents maintain their structural integrity and aesthetic appeal over time, even in harsh environmental conditions.
retractablePergolaRoof.soundAbsorptionText: The membrane materials manufactured by Serge Ferrari offer superior weather resistance, providing protection against rain, wind, and snow. This makes Serge Ferrari membrane tents suitable for use in various climates and environments.
retractablePergolaRoof.aestheticText: Serge Ferrari membranes come in a wide range of colors, textures, and translucency options, allowing for the creation of visually stunning membrane tent designs. Whether you prefer a sleek, modern look or a more natural aesthetic, there are options available to suit your preferences.
retractablePergolaRoof.sustainabilityText: Serge Ferrari is committed to sustainability and environmental responsibility. Their membranes are recyclable and manufactured using eco-friendly processes, making them a preferred choice for environmentally conscious projects.
retractablePergolaRoof.colorDesc: You can select from a wide range of available colors or customize the palette to match your personal taste and style. Your pergola can be exactly as you envision it. You have the option to choose from an extensive selection of colors provided in the RAL menu.

retractableLouveredRoof.title: Retractable Louvered Roof
retractableLouveredRoof.heroDesc1: The Art Deco Retractable Louvered Roof is the perfect solution for covering terraces and patios. This advanced weather protection system features adjustable roof slats that allow for complete shade, partial shade, or an open sky view, all within a single structure.
retractableLouveredRoof.heroDesc2: The Art Deco Louvered Roof offers optimal protection from sun, rain, and snow, while also ensuring excellent ventilation.
retractableLouveredRoof.engineeredDesc: Our bioclimatic pergolas combine advanced engineering with organic design to provide total control over your environment.
retractableLouveredRoof.rainText: When the louvers close completely, they form a watertight seal. Integrated drainage channels efficiently redirect rainwater to the structure's supports, allowing you to enjoy protected outdoor living even during heavy rainfall.
retractableLouveredRoof.solarText: The adjustable slats provide precise control over solar radiation, reducing heat gain in summer while allowing maximum light penetration in winter. This natural temperature management improves comfort and reduces energy consumption.
retractableLouveredRoof.ventilationText: By rotating the louvers, you generate natural convection currents that cool the space without mechanical systems. The heated air rises and exits through the open slats, creating a pleasant, naturally ventilated environment.
retractableLouveredRoof.drainageText: Advanced water management channels direct rainfall away from the seating area. The system's engineering ensures rapid drainage while maintaining structural integrity under heavy loads.
retractableLouveredRoof.wallDesc: Attached directly to an existing wall or facade for maximum space efficiency and clean aesthetics.
retractableLouveredRoof.suspendedDesc: Hanging freely between two anchor points, ideal for covering open areas without ground posts.
retractableLouveredRoof.detachedDesc: Standalone structure with integrated support posts, perfect for independent outdoor spaces.
retractableLouveredRoof.integratedDesc: Built as part of a larger architectural structure for seamless design integration.
retractableLouveredRoof.closedDesc: Complete protection from rain and sun with maximum shade.
retractableLouveredRoof.slightlyOpenDesc: Partial ventilation with controlled light and airflow.
retractableLouveredRoof.middleOpenDesc: Optimal balance between shade, ventilation, and light control.
retractableLouveredRoof.fullyOpenDesc: Maximum light penetration with natural ventilation.
retractableLouveredRoof.bioclimaticText1: The slats of our bioclimatic pergolas rotate from a closed position to an open position, up to 135°.
retractableLouveredRoof.bioclimaticText2: The system generates pleasant natural ventilation by heating the louvres when they are exposed to solar radiation. This produces a natural convection movement.
retractableLouveredRoof.bioclimaticText3: An adjustable effect by turning the slats, with which we also control the entry of the desired sunlight into the space created by the pergola itself.
retractableLouveredRoof.bioclimaticText4: The rotating louvres help stabilize the internal micro-climate by reducing heat accumulation during warm seasons. The structure naturally disperses excess temperature, keeping the covered area cooler without the need for mechanical ventilation.
retractableLouveredRoof.bioclimaticText5: When fully closed, the slats form a watertight surface. Integrated drainage channels collect and redirect rainwater to the internal pillars, allowing users to enjoy outdoor spaces even during heavy rainfall.
retractableLouveredRoof.bioclimaticText6: By fine-tuning the rotation angle, the pergola allows complete control over brightness. From soft ambient light to maximum daylight penetration — users can tailor the atmosphere precisely to their needs.
retractableLouveredRoof.bioclimaticText7: All aluminum components are engineered for long-term resistance to corrosion, humidity, and UV radiation. This guarantees a stable, durable, and weather-resistant system suitable for all climates.
retractableLouveredRoof.ledLightingText: Integrated LED systems create ambiance and extend usability into the evening hours. The lighting can be dimmed or color-adjusted to match any mood or occasion.
retractableLouveredRoof.soundAbsorptionDesc: The structure's design and materials naturally dampen sound reflections, creating a peaceful acoustic environment. Rainfall sounds are muted, and external noise is reduced.
retractableLouveredRoof.slatText1: Our signature P-150 louver blade combines structural strength with elegant aesthetics.
retractableLouveredRoof.slatText2: The profile is engineered for optimal water management, efficient solar control, and superior durability in all climate conditions.
retractableLouveredRoof.feature1: Dine comfortably in any weather—open the louvers for a starlit dinner, or close them during unexpected rain.
retractableLouveredRoof.feature2: Create a shaded workspace that adapts to the sun's path, reducing glare and eye strain while maintaining fresh air circulation.
retractableLouveredRoof.feature3: Design a sanctuary where natural light and airflow can be adjusted for perfect meditation or relaxation.
retractableLouveredRoof.feature4: Host events with confidence—adjust the cover to suit guests' comfort throughout the day.
retractableLouveredRoof.feature5: Enjoy morning sun or afternoon shade; the louvered system gives you complete environmental control.
retractableLouveredRoof.feature6: A bioclimatic pergola isn't just shelter—it's an extension of your living space that evolves with your needs.

colorOptions.title:
COLOR
OPTIONS
colorOptions.description: You can select from a wide range of available colors or customize the palette to match your personal taste and style. Your pergola can be exactly as you envision it. You have the option to choose from an extensive selection of colors provided in the RAL menu.

somfy.title: Pergola Motorization:
somfy.intro: Somfy offers motorization solutions for pergolas, allowing for easy opening and closing of pergola roofs or louvers. These systems typically include motors, controls, and sensors to automate the movement of pergola elements. Somfy's pergola motorization systems are designed for both residential and commercial applications, providing convenience, comfort, and protection from the elements.
somfy.item1Text:
The EOLIS RTS utilizes advanced technology to detect changes in wind speed and automatically retract motorized awnings or exterior shades when strong winds are detected.
It acts as a preventative measure to protect your awnings, shades, and outdoor furniture from potential damage caused by high winds.
somfy.item2Text:
As part of Somfy's RTS (Radio Technology Somfy) ecosystem, the SUNIS WireFree RTS communicates wirelessly with compatible motorized shading systems.
By automatically adjusting motorized shading systems in response to changes in sunlight levels, the SUNIS WireFree RTS helps reduce solar heat gain and minimize reliance on artificial cooling systems, leading to potential energy savings.

sunRoomSystems.title: Sun Room Systems
sunRoomSystems.heroDesc1: Our Sun Roof Systems offer a versatile window solution, providing full weather protection while allowing abundant natural light. Featuring insulated glass panels, they ensure energy efficiency and superior insulation.
sunRoomSystems.heroDesc2: The sleek design integrates seamlessly with any architecture, and the high-quality materials guarantee durability and low maintenance. With easy operation and optional shading systems, our Sun Roof Systems create a comfortable and inviting space year-round.
sunRoomSystems.technicalDesc: Sunroom brings numerous benefits such as enhanced natural light, creating additional space for relaxation or socializing, and establishing a strong connection with the outdoors.
sunRoomSystems.heaterDesc: Shut-off timer function, the carbon infrared heater keeps your space warm even in harsh winter conditions
sunRoomSystems.fanDesc: It is the process of adding a profile in the same color as your system color for the fan you want to add in your winter garden.
sunRoomSystems.lightDesc: It can shine light in hard-to-reach areas and shine in any color you can imagine.
sunRoomSystems.idea1Desc: Artdeco Guillotine Window systems perfectly match with your bioclimatic pergola
sunRoomSystems.idea2Desc: Motorized Sunshade Screens protect your outdoor living area from sunshine, dust, insects
sunRoomSystems.idea3Desc: With Artdeco Sliding Glass Doors add seamless transition to your Louvered Pergola
sunRoomSystems.idea4Desc: Upgrade your louvered pergola with a stunning set of bifold doors
sunRoomSystems.idea5Desc: Zip Screen is an outdoor shading system for bioclimatic pergolas, offering protection from sun, wind, and rain with secure, motorized or manual screens.

liftSlidingDoors.title: Lift & Sliding Doors
liftSlidingDoors.heroDesc1: Discover the perfect addition to your home, hotel, restaurant, or balcony with our innovative lift-sliding doors.
liftSlidingDoors.heroDesc2: Art Deco Products are renowned for their commitment to environmental sustainability, innovation, and exceptional quality.
liftSlidingDoors.heroDesc3: Embrace the magic of effortless operation as our lift-and-slide mechanism effortlessly opens even oversized vents with just the push of a finger. Enjoy unobstructed views and easy access to outdoor areas, enhancing the flow of your living spaces and creating a truly immersive experience with nature.
liftSlidingDoors.technicalDesc: Sliding doors open and close easily and take up less space compared to hinged doors. This is especially important for small spaces and spectators views look. Sliding doors are compatible with any type of styles , such as modern and traditional, and they can be easily matched with any décor.
liftSlidingDoors.doubleGlassDesc: It provides excellent insulation and protection with its double-layer glass design.
liftSlidingDoors.railDesc: It has double, triple and quadruple rail features. Wings can be made twice as long as each rail.
liftSlidingDoors.heatInsulatedDesc: Extra insulation is provided thanks to the specially produced aluminum material.
liftSlidingDoors.durabilityDesc: These profiles are designed to withstand extreme weather conditions, including resistance to wind pressures up to 1200 Pa and excellent water tightness. The use of high-quality materials such as stainless steel and high-resistant polyamide ensures long-lasting durability and silent operation​
liftSlidingDoors.aestheticDesc: The membrane materials manufactured by Serge Ferrari offer superior weather resistance, providing protection against rain, wind, and snow. This makes Serge Ferrari membrane tents suitable for use in various climates and environments.
liftSlidingDoors.sustainabilityDesc: Serge Ferrari is committed to sustainability and environmental responsibility. Their membranes are recyclable and manufactured using eco-friendly processes, making them a preferred choice for environmentally conscious projects.
liftSlidingDoors.slidingMechDesc: The sliding parts and bogie wheels are designed to ensure smooth and silent operation, providing effortless movement of the doors​. These components can be adjusted to accommodate different sash weights, ensuring smooth sliding even with heavy door panels​
liftSlidingDoors.handlesDesc: Offers a range of handles designed for ergonomic use and aesthetic appeal. They provide comfortable grip and are available in different finishes to match various interior styles.
liftSlidingDoors.lockingDesc: Their multi-point locking systems enhance security by providing several locking points, making it difficult for intruders to force open the door.

safetyStrength.title: Safety & Strength
safetyStrength.leadText: Our systems utilize specialized safety glass. Through rigorous controlled thermal treatments, we produce glass that is up to five times stronger than standard options, ensuring lasting security and peace of mind.
safetyStrength.temperedDesc: Built to withstand extreme impacts and thermal fluctuations without compromise.
safetyStrength.securityDesc: In the event of breakage, the glass shatters into small, blunt granules to prevent any risk of injury.

vertiglassWindow.heroDesc1: Our Vertiglass window systems feature vertically operating insulated glass panels that transform into a glass railing when fully opened, with the panels stacking neatly downward.
vertiglassWindow.heroDesc2: These windows provide a seamless transition from a fully enclosed space to an open-air environment at the push of a button, allowing you to enjoy the outdoors while still being protected when needed.
vertiglassWindow.heroDesc3: Ideal for balconies, hotels, restaurants, sunrooms, and terraces, our guillotine windows combine functionality and style to enhance any space.
vertiglassWindow.technicalDesc: VertiGlass Window System is a cutting-edge window solution crafted for both efficiency and convenience. It includes a double-layer glass construction, heat-insulated profiles, and remote-controlled functionality, providing superior insulation, security, and user-friendliness.
vertiglassWindow.doubleGlassDesc: It provides excellent insulation and protection with its double-layer glass design.
vertiglassWindow.remoteControlDesc: Opening and closing movements of the guillotine windows can be provided by remote control.
vertiglassWindow.movementOptionDesc: Extra insulation is provided thanks to the specially produced aluminum material.
vertiglassWindow.spaceEfficiencyDesc: Unlike traditional swinging windows, vertiglass do not require extra space to open, making them ideal for areas with limited space.
vertiglassWindow.ventilationDesc: These systems can be opened partially or fully, allowing for precise control of ventilation and airflow.
vertiglassWindow.aestheticsDesc: The sleek design provides a contemporary look, enhancing the architectural appeal of a building.
vertiglassWindow.viewsDesc: The sleek design provides a contemporary look, enhancing the architectural appeal of a building.
vertiglassWindow.lockingSystemsDesc: Large glass panels offer expansive views and allow maximum natural light into the space.
vertiglassWindow.panel2Desc: Ideal for smaller spaces that require elegant symmetry and uncompromised light flow.
vertiglassWindow.panel3Desc: Our most popular residential model. Provides the perfect balance for panoramic terrace views.
vertiglassWindow.panel4Desc: Engineered for grand architectural openings and commercial storefronts needing maximum scale.
vertiglassWindow.smartMotionDesc: The VertiGlass Window System integrates double-layer insulated glass with a silent motor. Control your environment with absolute precision and enjoy superior thermal protection.

slidingGlassDoors.heroDesc1: Our sliding doors transform spaces by making walls vanish seamlessly, merging the interior with the natural surroundings.
slidingGlassDoors.heroDesc2: These doors are a popular choice for a variety of settings, including homes, hotels, restaurants, and balconies. The modern glass architecture fosters a new way of living, emphasizing openness and connection with the outdoors.
slidingGlassDoors.technicalDesc: Modern sliding glass doors that combine elegance with functionality. Designed for seamless transition between indoor and outdoor spaces with superior insulation and weather protection.
slidingGlassDoors.smoothSlidingDesc: Advanced roller mechanism ensures smooth and silent operation with minimal effort.
slidingGlassDoors.insulationDesc: Double-glazed design provides excellent thermal and acoustic insulation.
slidingGlassDoors.weatherResistantDesc: Premium sealing system protects against rain, wind, and dust for year-round comfort.
slidingGlassDoors.spaceEfficiencyDesc: Sliding doors operate along a track rather than swinging open, saving valuable floor space.
slidingGlassDoors.easeOfAccessDesc: They provide a wide opening, making it easier to move large items in and out.
slidingGlassDoors.naturalLightDesc: Large glass panels maximize natural light, enhancing the indoor environment.
slidingGlassDoors.aestheticAppealDesc: Modern and sleek, sliding doors enhance the visual appeal of any space.

aboutPage.heroDesc1: Based in the UK, ArtDeco Outdoor specializes in high-quality exterior solutions designed for modern living.
aboutPage.heroDesc2: Our commitment to innovation and excellence has made us a trusted partner for architects and homeowners worldwide.
aboutPage.heroDesc3: We deliver cutting-edge outdoor systems that transform spaces and enhance quality of life.
aboutPage.heroDesc4: With decades of expertise, we continue to set industry standards for performance and design.
aboutPage.officesDesc: Connect with our team around the world
